column4: literally like what I should do after install?
Is the Live CD like Knoppix in the extent that it's the whole distro on CD?
And another thing holding me back is this 'Fedora Core 3 For Dummies' right next to me
Wait, you DO have mplayer in Ubuntu, correct?
you won't regret it.. it all depends on what you would like though... warty if you want stable.. hoary if you are courageous
I'm using totem-xine plus the codecs from merilat and it works great
totem-gstreamer was a no-go for me
there is a guide on the wiki to downgrade but I wouldn't do it... I tried several times on my testbox and again no-go
but you can always use Warty with backporting
yes.. that means you run warty but with certain progs from hoary
but again.. I wouldn't recommend it lol
it is good that you ask all those questions though :)
